item.title: IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation
item.dc:creator: Zé Vinícius
item.description:
Today I just received an awesome message. I have been contemplated with a travel grant from IEEE APS to present my paper at the IEEE APS/URSI conference which will be held in Puerto Rico! :)

item.description: I found the “Improvements to the SunPy database” project interesting among the ideas present in SunPy’s wiki page.
